videoName: 5 Minute Meditation You Can Do Anywhere
description: In just 5 minutes, you can reset your day in a positive way. This meditation serves as a gentle introduction to mindfulness, for beginners!
A gentle meditation to relax your mind and release stress. This can be practiced anywhere and requires little space. A good way to start or end your day.
If you're feeling stressed or overwhelmed, listen to this guided meditation to re-center yourself. Regain a moment of calm when life gets overwhelming.
This video guides you through a simple at home meditation to help provide relief from anxiety. This video is easy to follow for beginners!
This meditation welcomes balance and clarity to your mental and emotional self. Practice this regularly to connect your brain to body for mental health and wellbeing.
Relax and fall asleep fast with this guided meditation. Soothing rain sounds can help you relax and fall into a more rejuvenated sleep.
